(Reuters) - Europes new COVID-19 cases have doubled in five weeks, propelling the region on Sunday across the bleak milestone of 10 million total infections, according to a Reuters tally.

articles.description: The "dose" of the virus you receive might make the difference between being asymptomatic, getting mildly sick or becoming critically ill.
articles.content:
